page.title: 07Doctor House Area 1
page.content: cattle. The Collings farm, for example, has 110 acres with only 8 for good quality grazing. 80 cattle, mainly Friesian, are kept and the only product sold is unpasteurised milk. The area is crossed by{two important {roads.}There is Thurston Clough Road which was the original main road crossing the Pennines in this area in the{last century.}Today it is a narrow country lane with very little traffic. There is also the{A62}which replaced the previous road as the main trans - Pennine route from Leeds to Manchester. This has in turn been eclipsed by the M62 so that today it is mainly used as commuter route into Oldham and Manchester. There is a continuing problem of {heavy traffic}passing through the hamlet near the Old Original public house to the quarry and tip.
